getCertificateDetails

public void getCertificateDetails(CertificateDAO certificate)
Adds to the certificate the information about its owner and CA certificate

Parameters:
certificate - Certificate to which will be added the information, also the ID of this certificate will be used as SQL filter

getByAdvancedFilter

public java.util.List<CertificateDAO> getByAdvancedFilter(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> filter)
                                                   throws DBException
Gets a list of certificates that were founded using the specified filter

Parameters:
filter - It's a Map which has the following structure:
  • Key = Tag of the filter to be used, should be define in DataBaseDictionary, this tags must be written as a SQL WHERE clause using PreparedStament form for example: 'DBfield = ?' or 'DBfield LIKE ?'
  • Value = Must be a string array of 2 positions where:
    • [0] = Value to be searched in the data base
    • [1] = Data type, according to this, the PreparedStatemen will be constructed, the valid DataTypes are defined in the DataBaseDictionary (e.g DataBaseDictionary.FILTER_TYPE_TABLENAME_FIELDNAME)
Returns:
A list of certificates that agrees with the filter
Throws:
DBException - If something goes wrong during the SQL statement Execution

getCount

Get the total count of rows in Certificate table

public java.lang.Integer getCurrentId()

An integer that represents the current id

getCurrentSerialNumberForCA

public java.lang.Integer getCurrentSerialNumberForCA(java.lang.Integer caSubjectId)
Get the current serial number for the CA

Parameters:
caSubjectId - CA subject Id of which the serial number is required
Returns:
the current serial number corresponding to the selected CA
